info.title: Turca App - Software
info.desc: Turca App application services with simple, practical and speed
info.author: Mehmet Sait Das

mobile.title: Come Eat
mobile.desc: Come Eat application works uniquely in businesses such as cafes, restaurants and hotels. Our application supports apple, android and web platforms. Your customers can easily order by scanning the QR code or from home. As soon as the order is placed, it is automatically notified and sent to the system. How about managing your business via iPad and phone? You can also contact us via the application on issues you are stuck on. Dont worry about whether I can do it, we have created a YouTube training channel for you

featuresLista.title: Qr Menu Order
featuresLista.desc: When a customer visits your business, they can only view the products on the QR Menu or place an order.You can forward incoming orders to the waiter or kitchen of your choice

featuresLista.title: Address Order
featuresLista.desc: Customers can easily place orders at home by opening the application. You can set the minimum cart amount based on distance by setting the business properties

featuresLista.title: Dashboard Report
featuresLista.desc: You can view and intervene in your business from anywhere in the world. You can also view daily, weekly, monthly and annual sales reports

featuresLista.title: Other Features
featuresLista.desc: It is a practical, simple, fast and easy-to-use software. Dont worry about how to do it, we have created a training channel on YouTube, you can take a brief look
